article_title: 'If they don't die of shelling, they will soon die of thirst and hunger'
sentence: In  Jabalia,  an  area  which  has  seen  heavy  fighting  as  Israeli  troops  are  conducting  a  new  ground  operation,  a  local  says  "people  are  trapped"  Nidal  al-Arabeed  tells  the  AFP  news  agency  that  "more  than  10"  of  his  family  members  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  air  strikes  on  the  city.
